entry.title: Dutch Court Sentences Tornado Cash Co-Founder to 5 Years in Prison for Money Laundering
entry.summary: A Dutch court on Tuesday sentenced one of the co-founders of the now-sanctioned Tornado Cash cryptocurrency mixer service to 5 years and 4 months in prison. While the name of the defendant was redacted in the verdict, it's known that Alexey Pertsev, a 31-year-old Russian national, has been awaiting trial in the Netherlands on money laundering charges.

entry.title: Shortcut For Boost’s Digital Bank Appears In Its Main App
entry.summary: A new shortcut for Boost Bank, the digital bank by Axiata and RHB Bank, has appeared in the main Boost app. In addition to having a separate application for the former, this addition will provide users with immediate access to it via the service’s e-wallet platform. Tapping on the shortcut will only lead to a […] The post Shortcut For Boost’s Digital Bank Appears In Its Main App appeared first on Lowyat.NET.

entry.title: The Fundamentals of Cloud Security Stress Testing
entry.summary: ״Defenders think in lists, attackers think in graphs,” said John Lambert from Microsoft, distilling the fundamental difference in mindset between those who defend IT systems and those who try to compromise them. entry.title: Pembinaan semula Gaza ambil masa berdekad lamanya
entry.summary: Pembinaan semula infrastruktur kediaman yang musnah di Gaza akan mengambil masa sehingga 2040.
